name: fidget
text: A comment left by fidget was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, Connellingus, _cheesekayke, NDCaesar, timmythecat)

text: Yes.

name: madnes
text: BEEP BOP DOOTLE DOP

name: littlefatdog
text: agreed

name: 1000hz
text: Ray can only spell the part of Ramada that is in his name.

name: cailetshadow
text: ..and he can only write those letters in the same stlye he sees them monogrammed around his house.

name: nighttoad
text:
i always thought it was more like a map than an attempted spelling of "ramada"

the R (ramada inn) is right next to the A (airport).

name: shakey
text: Im with Nighttoad, the R A looks like shorthand to me. Ray has a wonderful economy with words.

name: epicurus
text: Ray's notes astound me. Even my notes are not that spartan. I also love the last panel.

name: phthoggos
text: "iiiiii"

name: dicklaurent
text: I always read it as ���

name: nosearmy
text:
does this look right

���

name: dicklaurent
text: I meant to type u with � (umlaut) over it.

name: farqussus
text: all i get is a grey diamond with a question mark in it

name: yomimono
text: Assetbar reflects what happens in my brain when letters have diacritic markings on them.  Really, it's saving me a lot of trouble.

name: jerkface
text: Really, the only way to get through to a large organization is to call Aaron or Aaron's local representative out.

name: i_love_kate
text: Isn't it a tad odd that in order to simply be accepted into the Great Outdoor Fight, one must beat a past champion?

name: nigelchaos
text: You only have to do that if you're BOC. Otherwise it's qualifying rounds!

name: tekende
text: Maybe you don't have to beat them. Maybe you just have to last a minute in the ring or something.

name: tekende
text: The alt text on this one gets me every time.

name: al_batross
text: A comment left by al_batross was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, riotdejaneiro, salo, atticusonline, mystkmanat, yingkaixing)

name: hyetal
text: man what

name: ubermensch
text: THESE KNIVES

name: beverage
text: ..cry every night for you

name: soticoto
text: ... boo to that. -_-;

name: darqhermit
text:
Al_batross. What is that thing in your avatar? I bought a key chain just like that in Korea, and have since been unable to for the life of me find out who or what that character is.
I also liked your comment, even though I don't understand it. Similar to how I feel about Going For Gold.

name: psquid
text: Dunno if you'll see this, but since nobody's answered you yet, I feel obliged to inform you that that thing is Tony Tony Chopper .

name: wulvaine
text:
Ray is BOC. What makes this more interesting is that Ramses had no blood of his own.

Just gallons upon gallons of other people's.

name: hyetal
text: Did we know before that Ray was left-handed?

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs (Saturday - Monday)

Philippe: Good communism today!
Mr. Bear: Rostropovich on cello.
Onstad: Maybe I'll get back into web design.

name: heccibiggs
text: Onstad's blog here is just cold hilarious, and it also accurately portrays my own web design knowledge, having not done any for about three years.

name: alzuna
text: I agree 100%, although I may know my tr from my td and how to do an image map, I was reading something about Ruby on Rails and web 2.0, etc the other day, and all I thought was; What the hell people, why can't you just be happy with an animated gif background.

name: achilleselbow
text: He writes down the room number in shorthand. Just can't be bothered to write down that "1".

name: centipede_damascus
text: Everyone should be thankful that Ray is not the one taking down phone messages for them.

name: shutup_shutup
text: The need for the asterisk in the second panel pretty well sums up why I love Achewood.

name: kotekan
text:
Ray is Blue Oyster Cult!

Fitting I suppose for a Harvester of Eyes .
